title: S15 Ep13: Supernatural News/Parashare: Death Of Nessie Edition

description:
Darkness Radio breaks all the Supernatural News that you need to know in our Death of Nessie Edition!

Tim's worse nightmare A.I. Ghosts, Nessie Dead? And a Shadow Reaper witnessed taking a soul, that and so much more PLUS Your stories!
